questions.question: So now let's roll back the clock and basically say, where did life in the ocean come from?
Is that the first moment where you saw that you were in a rat race?
And then in the evening, we just get back together and say, Hey, how was your consulting today?
Is there advice or any kind of thoughts that you can elucidate about the downs in your life?
And I think it's a very good analogy for our everyday society, where we're always saying, are you happy?
Can you maybe give some hints of the interesting different ways that your brain works as it aged?
Can you give a little bit more context about who you were in this moment?
Why, why are we, why do we humans fall in love in your own life?
Remember, I mean, again, if you, if you look at this poem, what is it saying?
